title: Arsenal: From relegation fears to European hopes - how has Arteta turned team's form around?
description: With three successive wins in the Premier League, Arsenal look to have turned relegation fears into European hopes once again.

title: Norway landslide: More bodies found as rescuers search Gjerdrum site
description: Four bodies have now been recovered following the landslide that destroyed homes in Ask village.

title: Tottenham: Harry Kane and Son Heung-min just keep getting better
description: After Harry Kane and Son Heung-min continue their 'telepathic' understanding against Leeds, are they destined to be the Premier League's best ever pairing?

title: EuroMillions: Jackpot of more than £39m won by UK ticket-holder
description: Just one ticket matched all seven numbers in the New Year's Day draw.

title: Covid-19: Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine arrives at hospitals
description: The first doses of the latest coronavirus vaccination to be approved are due to be given on Monday.

title: Mauricio Pochettino is back - but why has he chosen Paris St-Germain?
description: Thirteen months after leaving Tottenham, Mauricio Pochettino is back in football. Guillem Balague looks at why he has taken on the challenge at PSG.

title: Tottenham says they are 'extremely disappointed' after three players attend party
description: Tottenham criticise three of their players for breaching coronavirus rules by attending a party over Christmas.

title: Fulham v Burnley postponed after further positive coronavirus results
description: Fulham's match against Burnley at Turf Moor on Sunday is postponed after further positive coronavirus cases at the London club.

title: Australian surfer Mikey Wright rescues woman from Hawaii waves
description: Mikey Wright told the BBC rescuing a woman from 'sharp rocks and waves' on a beach in Hawaii.

title: Five India players isolating after meal in Melbourne restaurant
description: Five India players are isolating as a precaution after a video shows them eating indoors at a restaurant in Australia.

title: Schools reopening: Call for closures as Covid cases rise
description: Ministers say a decision to close all London primaries was a "last resort" to tackle Covid, but unions call for further action.

title: NBA: Luka Doncic shows off fancy footwork as Mavericks beat Heat
description: Watch the NBA's plays of the night including Luka Doncic's brilliant footwork to help Dallas Mavericks earn a 93-83 win over the Miami Heat.

title: Hospitals across UK 'must prepare for Covid surge', senior doctor warns
description: One of Britain's most senior doctors says the new strain of coronavirus is spreading across the country.

title: Coronavirus: Israel leads vaccine race with 12% given jab
description: With more than 1m people inoculated, Israel has by far the highest vaccination rate in the world.

title: France: More than 2,500 break virus restrictions at illegal rave
description: The New Year's Eve event, held in a warehouse in a village in Brittany, was shut down on Saturday.

title: Covid in Wales: Beauty spots 'busy' despite lockdown rules
description: People driving to visit beauty spots in Wales are breaking Covid rules, a Snowdonia park warden says.

title: US election: Legal bid to get Pence to overturn results rejected
description: A last-ditch attempt to overturn the result is overturned, days before the White House changes hands.

title: Runner Ben Blowes completes 31 marathons in a month and raises £138,000
description: Ben Blowes speaks of his relief at finishing after totting up more than 800 miles in the challenge.

title: The NFL Show: Why the Pittsburgh Steelers' 'pride' was behind dramatic turnaround
description: The NFL Show's Osi Umenyiora and Jason Bell explain how the Pittsburgh Steelers were able to pull off a dramatic turnaround in their game against the Indianapolis Colts.

title: What must Garcia do to win over doubters?
description: Ryan Garcia has been picked out as the most marketable athlete in boxing but what must the Instagram hit do to win over doubters?

title: Covid-19: Call for further schools closures, and the circus relying on food banks
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Saturday.

title: Circus ring mistress 'grateful' for food banks in lockdown
description: Olympia Posirca never thought she would have to rely on food banks but is grateful that they got her through 2020.

title: The Papers: Schools 'U-turn' and vaccine rollout 'revolt'
description: The coronavirus pandemic continues to dominate the newspaper front pages into 2021.

title: Covid: Metal detecting 'an escape from pandemic stress'
description: New detectorist Owen Thomas says "the link with a life that's gone" appeals to him.

title: Bird charity warns of harm from new wind farm
description: The giant development lies 75 miles away from England's largest sea bird colony in Yorkshire.

title: BBC Sound of 2021: What the class of 2020 did next
description: We catch up with Celeste, Yungblud, Easy Life, Joy Crookes and Inhaler to look back at 2020.

title: South Korea's 96-year-old pianist hopes to keep playing
description: South Korea's Jegal Sam still practises everyday, just in case he is asked to perform.

title: Five ways to reduce your carbon footprint
description: Climate activists explain how individuals can help reduce their carbon emissions.

title: 'We filmed our dad's final months to help people'
description: Two brothers make a documentary to show "you can still have a life" with terminal cancer.
